languages.text: {n}Маражай еще раз взвешивает кнут в руке и смеривает вас задумчивым взглядом. Наконец он негромко изрекает:{/n} "Хочешь испытать его в деле, {name}? Небольшую... демонстрацию?" {n}Он бросает быстрый взгляд на вашу руку.{/n}

{n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай еще раз взвешивает кнут в руке и смеривает вас задумчивым взглядом. Наконец он негромко изрекает:{/n} "Хочешь испытать его в деле, {name}? Небольшую... демонстрацию?" {n}Он бросает быстрый взгляд на вашу руку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋再次掂量了一下手中的鞭子，朝你投来了赞赏的目光。到了最后，他轻声问道。{/n}“你想试试吗，{name}？小小地……示范一下？”{n}他的目光瞟着你的手臂。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋再次掂量了一下手中的鞭子，朝你投来了赞赏的目光。到了最后，他轻声问道。{/n}“你想试试吗，{name}？小小地……示范一下？”{n}他的目光瞟着你的手臂。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはまた手で鞭の重さを測るようにし、こちらを査定するように見つめる。そして、そっと口を開いた。{/n}「試してみないか、{name}？ほんのちょっとだけ…実演がてら、な？」{n}彼の視線がサッとあなたの腕に向けられる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはまた手で鞭の重さを測るようにし、こちらを査定するように見つめる。そして、そっと口を開いた。{/n}「試してみないか、{name}？ほんのちょっとだけ…実演がてら、な？」{n}彼の視線がサッとあなたの腕に向けられる。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sopesa el látigo una vez más y te mira con expresión inquisitiva antes de hablar en voz baja.{/n} «¿Quieres probarlo, {name}? ¿Qué tal si te hago una... demostración?». {n}Su mirada se clava en tu brazo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sopesa el látigo una vez más y te mira con expresión inquisitiva antes de hablar en voz baja.{/n} «¿Quieres probarlo, {name}? ¿Qué tal si te hago una... demostración?». {n}Su mirada se clava en tu brazo.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai soupèse à nouveau le fouet dans sa main tout en vous jaugeant du regard, avant de reprendre d'une voix enjôleuse :{/n} « Vous voulez essayer, {name} ? Que diriez-vous d'une petite... démonstration ? » {n}Il rive les yeux sur votre bras.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai soupèse à nouveau le fouet dans sa main tout en vous jaugeant du regard, avant de reprendre d'une voix enjôleuse :{/n} « Vous voulez essayer, {name} ? Que diriez-vous d'une petite... démonstration ? » {n}Il rive les yeux sur votre bras.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wiegt noch mal die Peitsche in seiner Hand und wirft dir einen abschätzenden Blick zu. Anschließend fragt er leise:{/n} "Möchtet Ihr sie ausprobieren, {name}? Eine kleine ... Demonstration?" {n}Sein Blick wandert zu deinem Arm.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai wiegt noch mal die Peitsche in seiner Hand und wirft dir einen abschätzenden Blick zu. Anschließend fragt er leise:{/n} "Möchtet Ihr sie ausprobieren, {name}? Eine kleine ... Demonstration?" {n}Sein Blick wandert zu deinem Arm.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, eliyle kamçının ağırlığını bir kez daha tartıyor ve bakışlarıyla seni değerlendiriyor.{/n} "Denemek ister misin {name}? Minik bir... Gösteri yapsak mı?" {n}Gözleri, koluna odaklanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai weighs the whip in his hand once more and gives you an appraising look. At last, he says softly,{/n} "Do you want to try it out, {name}? A little... demonstration?" {n}His eyes dart to your arm.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, eliyle kamçının ağırlığını bir kez daha tartarak sana değerlendiren bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Denemek ister misin {name}? Minik bir... Gösteri yapsak?" {n}Gözleri, koluna odaklanıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
